name: Yet Another Nonogram
description:
Come and play a relaxing, classic picture puzzle game!

Yet Another Nonogram is a set of small nonogram puzzles (also known as Picross). There are nine in total, and they come together to form a singular picture.

I made this game as a way to learn LÖVE. It has been quite useful in informing me how it works, as well as in pointing out where my understanding is lacking.

How To Play Nonograms
